name: Chicken Biryani
recipe: Soak the Basmati rice for 30 minutes. Cook until 70% done. In a large pan, heat oil and sauté onions until golden brown. Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for a minute. Add chicken, turmeric, red chili powder, and salt. Cook until chicken is browned. Add tomatoes and cook until soft. Add yogurt and biryani masala. Cook until chicken is fully cooked. Layer the partially cooked rice over the chicken. Cover and cook on low heat until rice is fully cooked.

name: Paella
recipe: Heat olive oil in a large pan. Sauté chicken until browned. Add chopped onion, bell pepper, and garlic. Cook until softened. Stir in Arborio rice and cook for a couple of minutes. Add chicken broth, saffron, and paprika. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, adding more broth as needed until rice is cooked. Add shrimp, mussels, and peas. Cook until seafood is done and peas are tender. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Risotto
recipe: Heat olive oil and butter in a large pan. Sauté chopped onion until translucent. Add Arborio rice and cook for a couple of minutes. Pour in white wine and cook until evaporated. Gradually add chicken broth, stirring constantly, until rice is creamy and cooked. Stir in Parmesan cheese and season with salt and pepper.

name: Fried Rice
recipe: Heat oil in a large pan. Add beaten eggs and scramble. Set aside. In the same pan, sauté chopped onion and garlic until fragrant. Add mixed vegetables and cook until tender. Add cooked rice, soy sauce, and oyster sauce. Stir well. Add scrambled eggs back to the pan. Mix everything well and season with salt and pepper.

name: Jollof Rice
recipe: Blend tomatoes, bell peppers, and onion until smooth. Heat oil in a large pan. Add the blended mixture and tomato paste. Cook until the sauce thickens. Add thyme, curry powder, and chicken broth. Bring to a boil. Add washed rice to the sauce. Mix well and reduce heat. Cover and simmer until rice is cooked and liquid is absorbed.

name: Sushi Rice
recipe: Rinse the sushi rice until the water runs clear. Cook rice with water in a rice cooker. In a small saucepan, heat rice vinegar, sugar, and salt until dissolved. Transfer cooked rice to a large bowl and gently fold in the vinegar mixture. Allow rice to cool to room temperature before using for sushi.

name: Bibimbap
recipe: Cook rice according to package instructions. Sauté zucchini, carrot, and spinach separately with a little oil and salt. Set aside. In the same pan, cook ground beef with soy sauce, minced garlic, salt, and pepper. Fry eggs sunny side up. Assemble by placing rice in a bowl. Top with vegetables, beef, and egg. Add a dollop of gochujang and drizzle with sesame oil before serving.

name: Arroz con Pollo
recipe: Heat olive oil in a large pan. Brown chicken thighs and set aside. Sauté chopped onion, bell pepper, and garlic until softened. Add rice, cumin, and paprika. Stir well. Add chicken broth, tomato sauce, and peas. Bring to a boil. Place chicken thighs back into the pan. Cover and simmer until rice is cooked and liquid is absorbed.

name: Pilaf
recipe: Melt butter in a large pan. Sauté chopped onion until translucent. Add rice, cumin, and cinnamon. Stir well. Add chicken broth and raisins. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and cover. Simmer until rice is cooked and liquid is absorbed. Stir in slivered almonds before serving.

name: Congee
recipe: Rinse rice and place in a large pot with water. Bring to a boil. Add chicken thighs, sliced ginger, and minced garlic. Reduce heat and simmer, stirring occasionally, until rice breaks down and congee thickens. Remove chicken, shred, and return to the pot. Season with soy sauce, sesame oil, and salt. Garnish with green onions before serving.

name: Cajun Rice
recipe: Heat olive oil in a large pan. Brown sausage and set aside. In the same pan, sauté chopped chicken until browned. Add chopped onion, bell pepper, celery, and garlic. Cook until vegetables are softened. Add rice, paprika, and thyme. Stir well. Add chicken broth and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until rice is cooked and liquid is absorbed. Stir in the browned sausage before serving.

name: Kimchi Fried Rice
recipe: Heat sesame oil in a large pan. Add diced pork belly and cook until crispy. Set aside. In the same pan, sauté chopped onion and garlic until fragrant. Add chopped kimchi and cook for a few minutes. Add cooked rice, soy sauce, and pork belly. Stir well. Push rice to the side and add beaten eggs. Scramble and then mix into the rice. Garnish with chopped green onions before serving.

name: Mexican Rice
recipe: Heat vegetable oil in a large pan. Sauté chopped onion and garlic until fragrant. Add rice and cook until lightly browned. Stir in chopped tomato, tomato sauce, cumin, salt, and pepper. Add chicken broth and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until rice is cooked and liquid is absorbed. Stir in peas and corn before serving.

name: Arancini
recipe: Prepare risotto and let it cool. Form rice into small balls, placing a cube of mozzarella cheese in the center of each. Dredge balls in beaten eggs, then coat with breadcrumbs. Heat vegetable oil in a large pot. Fry rice balls until golden brown. Serve with marinara sauce on the side.

name: Hainanese Chicken Rice
recipe: Boil chicken in a large pot until cooked. Remove and set aside. In a separate pan, sauté minced garlic and ginger until fragrant. Add rice and cook for a few minutes. Transfer rice to the pot with chicken broth. Cook until rice is done. Slice the chicken and serve over the rice. Drizzle with a mixture of soy sauce and sesame oil before serving.
